articles.author: Herman Mostert
articles.title: Stormers stars Libbok, Mngomezulu earn Springbok call-ups, veteran Vermeulen absent - News24
articles.description: Stormers backline stars Manie Libbok and Sacha Mngomezulu earned their first Springbok call-ups after coach Jacques Nienaber named his squad for the year-end tour to Europe.
articles.content:
Stormers backline stars Manie Libbok and Sacha Mngomezulu earned their first Springbok call-ups on Friday after coach Jacques Nienaber named his squad for the year-end tour to Europe.

articles.title: Porsche and Lamborghini get stay of execution on Europe's petrol car ban - Drive
articles.description: Low-volume carmakers will get an extra year to comply with a European ban on engines, while synthetic fuels will become part of the solution.
